data.description:
Welcome to "Cactus Jam," an exhilarating multiplayer VR game created by two brothers in a basement! 

Immerse yourself in a thrilling desert landscape complete with sand dunes, rocky outcrops, and swaying cacti, all under the watchful eye of a hovering UFO. 

Engage in an epic game of hide-and-seek between aliens and cacti, where stealth and deception are key as you master the art of blending in to outsmart your opponents. 

Dive into this immersive VR experience and experience the adrenaline rush of the hunt in a visually stunning and cartoonishly captivating environment.

changelog.change_log:
Release Notes: Cactus Jam Alpha Build (Version 0.1.34)

Welcome to the alpha build of Cactus Jam, the multiplayer VR game from two brothers in a basement! Immerse yourself in a thrilling desert landscape with a UFO hovering above as you embark on an exciting game of hide-and-seek between aliens and cacti.

Update Notes:

* Added "Ready Up" mechanic to the pre-game lobby
* Fixed store bug handling
* Increased performance
* Updated player movement
* Squashed many other minor bugs

Key Features:

Desert Environment: Explore the obscure crater in the middle of a vast desert landscape. Complete with sand dunes, rocky outcrops, and swaying cacti, all under the watchful eye of a hovering UFO.

Aliens vs. Cactus Gameplay: Engage in a game of hide-and-seek where aliens hunt down sentient cacti players posing as NPC cacti to evade capture.

Stealth and Deception: As a cactus player, master the art of blending in with the environment to outsmart your alien adversaries.

Immersive VR Experience: Dive into a fully immersive VR world with stunning visuals and cartoonish environmental effects.

Known Issues:

Jam Bullet Collisions: Sometimes collisions between jam bullets and players may not register correctly, causing inconsistent gameplay. (Jam bullets may also instantly disappear after exiting the bug due to buggy collisions.)

Teleportation not Working: Sometimes when switching between games or scenes, players may not spawn at the correct locations. We are working to resolve this, if you encounter this in the meantime; you can fix it by leaving the game through the menu ("B") and rejoining the game. Or by quitting the app entirely, and re-logging.

Player Collision Interactions: Some interactions with Players & NPC cacti may not register correctly, affecting gameplay consistency.

NPC Spawn Locations: NPCs may occasionally spawn in incorrect locations, such as the invisible boundary in the sky, impacting gameplay consistency and immersion.

Game not Ending: Sometimes the game doesn't end when it should, and it waits until the next day cycle before it updates. We are working to resolve this

Balancing Adjustments: We are actively fine-tuning gameplay balance based on player feedback for future updates.

How to Participate:

Join the Discord: Connect with our community on Discord to engage in discussions, share feedback, and report any issues directly to the artist and developer.

Discord Link: https://discord.gg/tvK4XKqC

Provide Feedback: Share your thoughts and bug reports to help us improve the game.

Feedback Form: https://forms.gle/dvXwzDKyH2T2SvqU9

Spread the Word: Invite friends to join the alpha testing program for a more immersive multiplayer experience.
Thank you for joining us on this exciting journey! 

Mr. Smooth & TheSnowdanceKid

* Updated player & jam bullet collisions
* Squashed many other minor bugs

Key Features:

Desert Environment: Explore the obscure crater in the middle of a vast desert landscape. Complete with sand dunes, rocky outcrops, and swaying cacti, all under the watchful eye of a hovering UFO.

We are working to resolve this, if you encounter this in the meantime; you can fix it by leaving the game through the menu ("B") and rejoining the game. Or by quitting the app entirely, and re-logging.

Player Collision Interactions: Some interactions with Players & NPC cacti may not register correctly, affecting gameplay consistency.

NPC Spawn Locations: NPCs may occasionally spawn in incorrect locations, such as the invisible boundary in the sky, impacting gameplay consistency and immersion.

Game not Ending: Sometimes the game doesn't end when it should, and it waits until the next day cycle before it updates. We are working to resolve this

Release Notes: Cactus Jam Alpha Build (Version 0.1.15)

Welcome TheSnowdanceKidild of Cactus Jam, the multiplayer VR game from two brothers in a basement! Immerse yourself in a thrilling desert landscape with a UFO hovering above as you embark on an exciting game of hide-and-seek between aliens and cacti.

Update Notes:

* Added name tags
* Added Spray Paint mechanic
* Added the General Store
* Added the Museum
* Added the Theater
* Updated player movement
* Updated player & jam bullet collisions
* Fixed a bug that caused the game to not restart after ending
* Fixed menu buttons
* Squashed many other minor bugs

Key Features:

Desert Environment: Explore the obscure crater in the middle of a vast desert landscape. Complete with sand dunes, rocky outcrops, and swaying cacti, all under the watchful eye of a hovering UFO.

Aliens vs. Cactus Gameplay: Engage in a game of hide-and-seek where aliens hunt down sentient cacti players posing as NPC cacti to evade capture.

Stealth and Deception: As a cactus player, master the art of blending in with the environment to outsmart your alien adversaries.

Immersive VR Experience: Dive into a fully immersive VR world with stunning visuals and cartoonish environmental effects.

Known Issues:

Jam Bullet Collisions: Sometimes collisions between jam bullets and players may not register correctly, causing inconsistent gameplay. (Jam bullets may also instantly disappear after exiting the bug due to buggy collisions.)

Teleportation not Working: Sometimes when switching between games or scenes, players may not spawn at the correct locations. We are working to resolve this, if you encounter this in the meantime; you can fix it by leaving the game through the menu ("B") and rejoining the game. Or by quitting the app entirely, and re-logging.

Player Collision Interactions: Some interactions with Players & NPC cacti may not register correctly, affecting gameplay consistency.

NPC Spawn Locations: NPCs may occasionally spawn in incorrect locations, such as the invisible boundary in the sky, impacting gameplay consistency and immersion.

Game not Ending: Sometimes the game doesn't end when it should, and it waits until the next day cycle before it updates. We are working to resolve this

Balancing Adjustments: We are actively fine-tuning gameplay balance based on player feedback for future updates.

How to Participate:

Join the Discord: Connect with our community on Discord to engage in discussions, share feedback, and report any issues directly to the artist and developer.

Thank you for joining us on this exciting journey!
